column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Went here on a Saturday at around noon and was super happy with the experience. It's a cool space and the food and coffee were delicious. We were super impressed with how fast the service was for how busy it was
column2: it seemed like the moment people were gone from their tables
column3: the staff had it cleaned and ready for the next customer. The coffee and food came out really quickly as well.
